patthana17.31:1.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
patthana17.31:2.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.31:3.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
